pci_project_new_payment_method_add_expla: You need to register a payment method to validate your identity.  You will not be debited and nothing will be withdrawn until you consume resources.
pci_project_new_payment_method_add_info_: By clicking ‘Create my project’, you will be redirected to our service provider's secure interface to save a new bank card. A small amount is deducted from your bank account to confirm your card's validity, and verify that your details have been entered correctly. Nothing will be charged to your account.
By clicking ‘PayPal’, you will be redirected to the PayPal secure interface to register your account.
By clicking ‘Add’, you will be redirected to the ”My payment methods section of the OVHcloud Control Panel.
pci_project_new_payment_method_add_warni: Your payment card will be validated between 24 and 48 hours after we have received your direct debit authorisation, which needs to be sent by post. After it has been validated, you can create a Public Cloud project.
If you select PayPal, a transaction of {{amount}} will be made on your account to confirm that it works properly. This credit is not lost. It will be used to pay for the first resources you deploy.
pci_project_new_payment_method_save_expl: You need to register a payment method to validate your identity and create your project.
If you do not use OVHcloud solutions, you will not have to pay any fees.
pci_project_new_payment_method_add_credi: A temporary imprint with your bank is made at the next step to confirm the validity of the card.
No amount will be charged to your payment card.
